algorithm

类 ThreeWayInteractiveRecommendation

  • java.lang.Object
    • algorithm.ThreeWayInteractiveRecommendation

  • public class ThreeWayInteractiveRecommendation
extends java.lang.Object
    ThreeWayInteractiveRecommendation.java Project: Matrix factorization for recommender systems. The data is organized in 2D of triples. Boolean means that a boolean matrix indicates the training set. The purpose is to enable incremental learning. Now only uncompressed data file is supported, that is, missing value is indicated by 99. In the near future, the data organized by triples should also be supported.
    作者:
    Fan Min www.fansmale.com, github.com/fansmale Email: minfan@swpu.edu.cn, minfanphd@163.com.

      • userStartingPoints

        int[] userStartingPoints
        The starting point of the user in the vector. The length should be (m + 1), where the last one is numRatings. In this way we do not have to store how many items have be rated by each user.

      • userCount

        int[] userCount
        The number of items rated by the corresponding users.

      • popBasedRecommend

        public void popBasedRecommend(int paraUser)
        Pop-based recommendation. With member variables currentUserRecommendationList and currentUserPromotionList, there is no need to return.
        参数:
        paraUser - The given user.

      • randomSelectFromArray

        public static int[] randomSelectFromArray(int[] paraArray,

        Randomly select some elements from the given array.
        参数:

        paraValidLength - Valid length of the array.
        paraNumSelection - The number of selected elements.

      • eliminateProcessed

        public static int[] eliminateProcessed(int[] paraArray,
                                       boolean[] paraProcessed)
        Eliminate elements that are already processed.
        参数:
        paraArray - The given array.
        paraProcessed - Indicate which elements have been processed.
        返回:
        The new array.

      • computeUserMaturityIncrement

        public double computeUserMaturityIncrement(int paraUser,
                                           int[] paraRecommendationArray,
                                           int[] paraPromotionArray)
        Compute the user maturity increment. For each recommendation to existing rating, the maturity increases by 5. For each recommendation to non-existing rating, the maturity increases by 2.5. For each promotion to existing rating, the maturity increases by 4. For each promotion to non-existing rating, the maturity increases by 2.
        参数:
        paraUser - The given user.
        paraRecommendationArray - The recommendation array.
        paraPromotionArray - The promotion array.

      • GLFactorizationJournal

        public void GLFactorizationJournal(int paraUser)
        ************************ GL Matrix Factorization recommendation.
        参数:
        paraUser - The given user ************************

      • glTransform

        public static double glTransform(double paraValue,
                                 double paraV,
                                 double paraLowerBound,
                                 double paraUpperBound)
        Transfer a rating value.
        参数:
        paraValue - The given value.

      • computeUserMaturity

        public double computeUserMaturity(int paraUser,
                                  int[] paraOnceRec)
        Compute the maturity of the user according to the current recommendation. The reaction is known from the data. E.g., recommend likes, promote dislikes.
        参数:
        paraUser - The index of the user.
        paraOnceRec - The recommendation in the last round.
        返回:
        The user maturity.
